messages.raw: [W:02][S:03]Hmph. An outsider.[K][2]You carry the Princess's words?[V]Her authority means little here.[K][3]The Hylians abandoned us long[V]ago. Show me proof that you[V]truly understand our pain.[K]

[W:02][S:03]That mask... it cannot be...[K][2]All these years... we mourned...[V]we cursed our kin who we[V]thought had betrayed us.[K][3]And it was HIM. The Pirate[V]King, Kydrog... he used our[V]likeness to sow hatred.[K][3][L], you have lifted a[V]shadow from our hearts that is[V]centuries old.[K]
[W:02][S:03]You gave us our names back,[V][L]. For that, we owe[V]you a great debt.[K][2]The river flows with a renewed[V]spirit. If you seek passage to[V]the hidden shoals, ask me.[K]
